KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Credential Awarded
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Indicates the credential that was awarded

KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Credits Earned
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Indicates the number of credits the student earned for successfully completing the course. Often done via a calculation by looking at the calculated grade and either awarding the number of attempted credits if it is a passing grade.

KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Administrative Final Grade
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Administrative Grade that was recorded for this student

KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Assigned Final Grade
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Grade as it was originally submitted by the faculty member on the grade sheet.

KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Calculated Final Grade
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Grade calculated based on the scale or option chosen and the grade actually submitted by the faculty member.

KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Interim Grade
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Grade assigned during at an interim period often used to flag students who might be struggling

KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Standardized Test Ranking
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: The ranking of the student within the peer group who took the test during the same time period. Often recorded as a percentage or a decile

KSEN_LRR_TYPE.NAME: Standardized Test Score
KSEN_LRR_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A score a student got by taking standardized test.
